TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void InitializingNewItemEventHandler(object sender, InitializingNewItemEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed InitializingNewItemEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.InitializingNewItem"> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
